item.title: Dead crow in front garden, 4th October
item.description:
This crow has already been reported and it has been claimed to be “fixed” however no action was taken to remove it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Drive, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Adelphi Terrace Lime Bikes Left parked along the path., 4th October
item.description:
Dear FixMyStreet. I am writing to report an issue regarding Lime that have been left parked along the side of the path on Adelphi Terrace (east). These bikes are causing an obstruction, making it difficult for pedestrians and other road users to pass safely. I kindly request that this matter be investigated, and appropriate action taken to ensure the path remains clear and accessible to all. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Adelphi Terrace, Waterloo, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicles in Twigg close carpark, 4th October
item.description:
The first big van has been here for 6 months and the recent space cruiser type car has been here for 2 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Twigg Close, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbis dumped outside 46 Durham rise, 4th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durham Rise, Plumstead, London
